summary:
Always in for the challenging opportunities, love to experience different environments, cultures and countries to work in. Creating and developing the project with the team, facing and solving challenges together, doing whatever it takes to get the result in the fashion we like. Creating a team, a together feeling, from a group of people by enthusiasm, spirit, respect and attention for the people and their activities. Being involved in complex and unique projects and situations over easy and repetitiveness. 

Taking along all experiences to develop myself as a person, experiences that come from the people I work and live with, the environment I work and live in and all the events that take place along the way. Everything, from day one till yesterday, especially the choices that have been made, shaped me to who I am today. And the choices of today shape my tomorrow. Dreams about the future start in the present.

profile_positions.description: Façade engineer on the Lusail Plaza Towers, the podium façade, being a built up of steel structures, insulating walls, waterproofing, aluminum windows and glazing, cladded with almost 60.000 UHPC panels in many different shapes. Involved in the procurement and package management of the façade steel structure and UHPC façade and everything that comes along with that. Also taking care as lead involved for the podium facade IFC design.
profile_positions.title: Façade engineer at Lusail Plaza towers

profile_positions.description: Engineering and management for the structural basement and superstructures. Also pushing to turn over a cast in-situ design to a much more efficient and higher quality precasted structure & superstructure. Interfaces between superstructure and façade.
profile_positions.title: Civil engineer at Lusail Plaza Towers

profile_positions.description:
The Musaimeer Pumpstation and Outfall project has as purpose to discharge all the stormwater for the south of Doha into the sea at 10 km from the shore line. As subcontractor we are responsible to construct the marine scope of the project, 10 km offshore near the airport of Doha, Qatar. The marine scope is the dredging, large diameter vertical shaft drilling in the sea bed, pre-construct and install GRP and concrete structures around 20 meters below the seawater level, to connect with the TBM-tunnel that is being drilled underneath the seabed, installation of the submerged diffuser installations, consisting of six HDPE pipelines with diameters between 2000 mm and 710 mm, 84 diffuser nozzels and all of its components, and when all is in place to recover the dredged material from the seabed in order to execute the backfilling of the installation (to bury the installation except the nozzles). 

As technical manager on the project I was involved directly in the full preparatory works, all procurement, supporting the construction, planning and quality teams, introducing LEAN planning to the project, actively involved with the client, executive reporting, and actively involved in the general project management with the project manager.
profile_positions.title: Technical Manager at Musaimeer Pumping Station and Outfall - Marine works

profile_positions.description:
In 2016 started on the project team for relocating bunkers and other historical objects from the 1930's. Challenge was to relocate these objects, with the biggest object a weight of 1600 ton, in the very soft soil. 

In 2017 and 2018 I worked in the technical office team for the construction of the lock, with challenges in the phasing, design, diaphragm walls and concrete works. A challenging project with a great team and result.
profile_positions.title: Technical Office Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Working as tender engineer for (mainly) civil projects. 

For the technical part this consists of phasing plans, determining execution methods, design choices in relation to execution, on-site logistics choices, 3D-design of special execution methods, exploring design options with subcontractors. 

Also less technical aspects such as drafting the tender organization, tender budget and tender planning along with a plan of approach proposals, cashflow analysis, reviewing and contributing for EMVI-plans (from technical/executional perspective), client dialogues, tender costs charts and setting op document systems.
profile_positions.title: Project engineer on (civil) tendering

profile_positions.description:
Started in October 2012 with observing the use of special formwork at the Amazonehaven in the Botlek/Maasvlakte area. Besix is constructing a new quay, measuring at about 2,5 km. 

Obviously, in construction quays there is a lot of repetition so I'm observing the use of a special formwork which is build on tracks for easy moving. With this formwork the concrete parts of the quay are being produced. The observations have been done from half October until the winter break in the end of December as the initiation of my graduation project. The graduation subject will be determined throughout these observations.

While observing for the complete cycle for producing the concrete parts of the quay, points of attention have been written down for further analysis. These analysis have been done after the observations with as result a goal to achieve for the complete graduation project. 

The research is focussed on minimizing possible delays in the construction phase by redesigning the formwork and the provision of information. Research is done to determine the best options to do so, while the design proces starts after the research phase. 

In the final stage of the project I designed an improved formwork solution, and along with plans for the construction phase it is possible to cast a segment every three days. To make sure the construction cycle is clear for the construction workers research is done on "how to provide information for the construction phase". The research results have been used to explain the construction cycle so changes on delays due to a lack of information are minimized.
profile_positions.title: Graduation Student

profile_positions.description: Advice in numerous categories of electronics, such as mobile phones, car-, sport- and outdoor GPS systems, computers, beamers, network and NAS solutions and many more. Providing our customer the best and complete advice for their situation and whishes.
profile_positions.title: Sales employee

profile_positions.description:
From September 2011 to September 2012 I have been part of the 35th board of study association SUPport. This is an association at the TU Eindhoven focused on the master track Building Technology (formerly Building Technology and Construction Technology).

In addition to general business for the association my main task during this year was organizing the SUPport studytour, with a small group of 5 committee members. The destination of the trip have become Finland, Estonia and Latvia and our aim was "Exploring Innovation", which has resulted in three case studies; North European steel systems, Building in extreme weather conditions, Timber structures in utility buildings. These studies have been done in collaboration with the foundation Bouwen met Staal, Heijmans and BAM Utiliteitsbouw.

In the organization of the study tour there is more then the destination choice and designing case studies, but also includes the sponsor- and fundraising, promotion, recruiting participants, program content and obtaining approval of the faculty.
profile_positions.title: Commissioner Studytour

profile_positions.description:
During college periods I worked parttime as an assistant work preparator at the project Metro Station Rotterdam Centraal, preparing flooring, glass inner façades, special tube ceiling and other finishings. 
During the summer period in 2010 I worked as acting foreman on the project Metro Station Rotterdam Centraal for producing concrete walls underneath train platforms. Controlling building site personnel, determine weekly production of concrete works, purchasing materials for production, leasing equipment. During this construction phase I particularly engaged in concrete constructions and auxiliary constructions.
profile_positions.title: Jr technical office engineer

profile_positions.description:
Ontwerp van de prefab betonnen gevelelementen en de ophangconstructie, productieplan van de prefab en het ontwerpen van een compleet uitvoeringsplan om de prefab te monteren, waarin materiaal, materieelinzet, tijd, inpassing in de projectplanning, logistiek en kosten zijn meegenomen.

Op 29 juni 2010 afgestudeerd na de presentatie te hebben gehouden voor het projectteam van NSP Rotterdam. Deze presentatie was ook direct de beoordeling voor het diploma.

Een tweede presentatie hebben we gegeven voor zo'n 100 docenten, oud-architecten en familie. Het afstuderen van mij in samenwerking met Roman van Os heeft geresulteerd in een 8 en een uitvoeringsplan wat grotendeels is uitgevoerd.
profile_positions.title: Bachelor graduation student

profile_positions.description: Samen met zes anderen in een team een renovatieplan van twee bestaande woningen op Rotterdam Zuid maken en daarvoor een bouwaanvraag indienen bij de gemeente Rotterdam. De panden zijn ingemeten, de panden beoordeeld op de bouwkundige staat en de bestaande constructie doorgerekend. Vervolgens ontwerpen en een door de opdrachtgever gewenst ontwerp uitwerken tot een professionele bouwaanvraag, waarbij het een reguliere aanvraag is geweest met zowel fase 1 als fase 2 compleet. De bouwaanvraag is inmiddels goedgekeurd door de gemeente.
profile_positions.title: Studieproject "Leren Bouwen"

volunteer_experiences.description:
Jong BESIX Nederland (JBN) is een organisatie opgezet voor ‘jongeren’ tot 36 jaar, die werken voor BESIX in Nederland. De activiteiten die JBN organiseert zijn gebaseerd op drie pijlers; Kennis, (Jongeren) Netwerk en Organisatie. Het doel van JBN is om door middel van het aanbieden van verschillende activiteiten de technische en algemene kennis van de jongere werknemers te vergroten. Daarnaast kunnen de jongere werknemers op informele wijze gemakkelijker en sneller een netwerk opbouwen binnen BESIX en de organisatie leren kennen.

Van enthousiaste deelnemer naar bestuurslid in 2014 naar bestuursvoorzitter vanaf 2018 is het organiseren van allerlei activiteiten voor de leden een zeer leuke bijdrage die ik met de andere bestuursleden kan leveren aan een leerzame en sterkere sociale omgeving binnen het bedrijf. Het enthousiasme en het brede draagvlak wat we hier in terug krijgen van onze leden zijn de inspanning meer dan waard!

Onderdeel van het bestuur van de Alumni vereniging van de Hogeschool Rotterdam wat betreft de opleiding bouwkunde. Presentaties georganiseerd voor zo'n 50 studenten gegeven door de architect van Benthem & Crouwel  en één van de  werkvoorbereiders van Mobilis TBI Infra over over het project NSP Rotterdam.
